result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for loading, parsing configuration files and handling sensitive data in structs, slices, and maps.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on configuration management and data privacy.

pkg/configs/configs.go.purpose: This file provides a function to load and parse configuration files into a specified struct type.

pkg/configs/func_print.go.purpose: This file contains functions for hiding sensitive data in structs, slices, and maps.

pkg/configs/func_print_test.go.purpose: Unit tests for hiding sensitive data in maps and slices.
